datalog

Class MigrationExecution

  • java.lang.Object
    • datalog.MigrationExecution
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TopDownExecution

    public class MigrationExecution
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a superclass for TopDownExecution with similar methods for both migration approaches: bottom up (not implemented yet!) or top down.
    Author:
    Stephanie Sombach and Katharina Wiech
